name: Ghosts of Miami (itch)
description:
Miami, 1986.

On average, one person is murdered every day in Dade County. Between the drug cartels, the AIDS epidemic, and a flood of undocumented immigrants, hundreds more will vanish, never to be seen again. Chelo Martínez finds the people who slip through the cracks.

Ghosts of Miami is a mystery visual novel, featuring a lot of decision-making, crime-solving, and heart-breaking. In each of the five cases, you get to pick how Chelo spends her time. You can follow leads or get distracted by dangerous romantic options.

Ghosts of Miami will be available by Summer 2017, in English, Spanish, and Traditional Chinese. We're also beta-testing some screenreading and text-to-speech technology, in addition to our gamepad and button-remapping accessibility options.

INSTALLATION INSTRUCTIONS:

WINDOWS:

  1. Download and install DirectX if you have never done so
  2. Extract the ZIP file
  3. Navigate to the directory containing "GhostsOfMiami.exe"
  4. Run that file!
  5. If you see a warning that says "Windows Protected Your PC", click "More Info" then "Run Anyway" (we're working on this issue!)

MAC:

  1. Extract GhostsOfMiami.app.zip
  2. Double click on GhostsOfMiami.app
  3. If you receive a warning that the application could not be opened, please follow these instructions to allow the application to run.

LINUX (64-BIT ONLY):

  1. Extract the ZIP file
  2. Navigate to the directory containing "ghostsofmiami.x86_64"
  3. Execute that file!
